title: Jungle Slime
summaries: The Jungle Slime is a type of slime only found in the Jungle during the daytime. They have relatively high damage and health compared to most Pre-Hardmode slimes of their size.
Notably, Jungle Slimes drop a much larger amount of <linked>coins</linked> than any common slime prior to <linked>Hardmode</linked>.
Like most other slimes, the Jungle Slime will be passive towards any player with the Royal Gel(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) accessory equipped.

On <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, and <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked>, they can rarely be found carrying <linked>bonus drops</linked>, which the player receives upon the slime's death.
